marklogic.body:
"supposedly" - like from what SOURCE, Chuckles? What's the friggin' LINK?
See, the amazing thing about this massive zombie winger problem that's screwed up this country so bad it's operating worse than a banana republic with extra stupid sauce (see below) is this really isn't about US, it's about you rubes & the grifters who run & lead your political party & organizations. You're taking the rest of us down with you, apparently operating under the delusion that's like a 'good thing', but the problem isn't between the wingosphere & the rest, it's between Â your lemmings & the grifters leading you by the pipe. They play you, constantly, then you expect the adults to come in & fix the mess, so we shut down the crooked carnival & organize a clean up the best we're able with you fat farts whining & moaning about making sure to keep our - OUR - grubby hands your friggin' somehow non-government-run Medicare & Social Assistance, & your magical roadways & bridges & airports that God apparently arranges for intermittently, plus your free cops & perfect teachers to fix up the appalling destruction you've done to the minds of your own kids, & if the crooked carny with the whizbang somehow perfectly safe while being completely unregulated thrill rides & the very. same. grifters. operating out of the exact. same. booths enticing you in with kewpie dolls you never win, aren't there for you & your fat retarded Jebus-blitzed kiddies the very next week, it's all SOCIALISM & a COMMIE PLOT. Â
Don't you get it? The grifters don't feed Off the rest of us, they don't con the rest of us, they don't fleece the rest of us - they just con, Bleed & skin YOU, with YOUR consent, YOUR votes, YOUR support.Â
All for kewpie dolls you never win.
